Command: I don't want Onions on my hamburger.
Operation: Click on the Checkbox for 'NO Crispy Onions'.
Click on the Button 'Add 1 to cart.'
Explanation: To remove onions from your hamburger, click on the Checkbox next to 'NO Crispy Onions'. Then, click on the Button 'Add 1 to cart.' This will update your order by removing onions and add the modified item to your cart.
